title: Federal Sunset Act of 1998

latestAction.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives deploring the tragic and senseless murder of Bishop Juan Jose Gerardi, calling on the Government of Guatemala to expeditiously bring those responsible for the crime to justice, and calling on the people of Guatemala to reaffirm their commitment to continue to implement the peace accords without interruption.

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime.

title: Expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to United States assistance or support for the investigation on capital punishment in the United States by the United Nations Human Rights Commission.
